summary: The audit for https://movingagain.com.au scored 94/100. Below is the list of issues requiring attention.

issues.remediation: Optimize your title length. Titles shorter than 50 characters may not convey enough information, while titles longer than 60 characters may be truncated.
Optimize your description length. Descriptions around 150-160 characters maximize screen real estate in search results without truncation.
Add article:modified_time meta tag or include dateModified in your Schema.org markup.
Add author bylines with links to author bio pages. Use schema.org/Person markup for best results.

issues.issue_detected: Reading score: 38 (College level) - may be too difficult
issues.remediation: Simplify sentences, use shorter words, and break up complex paragraphs. Aim for a score of 60+.
Strengthen your Trust Triangle by adding signals for: Security.
